description: Jordan Gibson scores before seeing red as Doncaster draw with Colchester in League Two
title: Jordan Gibson scores before seeing red as Doncaster draw with Colchester in League Two
title_page: Jordan Gibson scores before seeing red as Doncaster draw with Colchester in League Two - BBC Sport
maintext:
Colchester United have lost each of their last three league games against Doncaster Rovers, conceding eight goals in total during that time.
Doncaster Rovers have won three of their last six away league games against Colchester United (D1 L2), and are looking for successive away wins against them in the Football League for the first time since August 2014.
Colchester have lost their final league game of a calendar year on each of the last three occasions, conceding 10 goals in that time.
Doncaster are unbeaten on each of the last six occasions their final Football League game of a calendar year is played on the road (W3 D3), having lost each of their prior 14 such games.
